parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (CMF 11240002) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for tracking and reporting campaign finance.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Valeriu Iftime, who is presented as the president of PNL Botoșani.  It directly promotes the PNL party and encourages voting for "Echipa Valeriu Iftime," clearly linking the candidate to the desired electoral outcome. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The targeting includes numerous cities in Botoșani County, indicating an attempt to reach a significant portion of the electorate. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support Valeriu Iftime and the PNL party in the parliamentary elections.  Phrases like "Avem nevoie de toată mobilizarea pentru alegerile parlamentare," "Doar alegând #EchipaValeriuIftime, echipa PNL, putem schimba ceva cu adevărat în Botoșani!" and "Poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot" explicitly aim to influence voting behavior. This clearly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. While it uses some elements of news reporting (e.g., quoting Iftime), its core purpose is not to inform objectively but to advocate for a specific candidate and party.  The call to action ("ne vedem la vot") further reinforces its promotional nature.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a structured appeal for votes, presented as a campaign message from the PNL Botoșani president. The use of hashtags and the clear call to action negate the possibility of it being a personal opinion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1098833928367867</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Valeriu Iftime), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support the PNL party. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Valeriu Iftime</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Vocea Botoșani, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 1098833928367867) care constituie propagandă electorală, având ca scop influențarea votului în favoarea lui Valeriu Iftime și a PNL, prin apeluri directe la vot ("Avem nevoie de toată mobilizarea pentru alegerile parlamentare...", "Doar alegând #EchipaValeriuIftime, echipa PNL, putem schimba ceva cu adevărat în Botoșani!", "Poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot!"),  prezența unui număr CMF (CMF 11240002) indicând finanțare electorală, și vizând o audiență largă prin intermediul unei reclame plătite pe Facebook.  Efectul electoral este clar, vizând creșterea numărului de voturi pentru candidatul PNL.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
